Subject: Content Aware Policy for AI tools
Description:
Hi support, 

Are there any plans to add exit points for AI tools like ChatGPT etc? This was raised by one of our customers who are using Endpoint Protector. 

Kind regards, 
Kasia
What_We_Know__c:
- There is currently no dedicated feature in Endpoint Protector for defining exit points specifically for AI tools such as ChatGPT.
- The development team is aware of this need and is preparing a future feature to address scenarios involving AI tool monitoring and control.
- Customers can track planned features and enhancements on the Netwrix public roadmap.
- The customer has been informed of these plans and is satisfied with the response.
Next_Steps__c:
1. Customer to monitor the Netwrix public roadmap for updates on AI tool exit point support: https://portal.productboard.com/rqqgx2aos1cf9enrezvrre6a/tabs/56-planned
2. If there are specific requirements or use cases, customer can submit them via the Netwrix Ideas Portal to help prioritize development.
3. Support team to close the ticket as requested by the customer.
Solution_Comment__c: The customer was informed that support for exit points related to AI tools like ChatGPT is planned for a future release of Netwrix Endpoint Protector. The customer acknowledged the information and requested the ticket be closed.
